languages.text: {n}Энрих печально хмыкает.{/n} "Работа у меня такая, идти путями, где смерть поджидает. Но это не один из них — поезд самый надежный и быстрый способ выбраться отсюда. Не беспокойтесь, госпожа Тласс, вам и Лорд-капитану со мной ничего не угрожает".

{n}Einrich gives a sad little chuckle.{/n} "It is my job to take the paths where death may be prowling. But not this time. The train is the safest and fastest way out of here. Worry not, Mistress Tlass. You and the Lord Captain are quite safe with me."
languages.original_text: {n}Энрих печально хмыкает.{/n} "Работа у меня такая, идти путями, где смерть поджидает. Но это не один из них — поезд самый надежный и быстрый способ выбраться отсюда. Не беспокойтесь, госпожа Тласс, вам и Лорд-капитану со мной ничего не угрожает".

{n}Einrich gives a sad little chuckle.{/n} "It is my job to take the paths where death may be prowling. But not this time. The train is the safest and fastest way out of here. Worry not, Mistress Tlass. You and the Lord Captain are quite safe with me."

languages.text: {n}Einrich emite una risita triste.{/n} «Mi trabajo es tomar los caminos donde acecha la muerte, pero esta vez es distinto. El tren es la forma más rápida y segura de salir de aquí. No se preocupe, maestra Tlass. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán y usted están a salvo conmigo».
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich gives a sad little chuckle.{/n} "It is my job to take the paths where death may be prowling. But not this time. The train is the safest and fastest way out of here. Worry not, Mistress Tlass. You and the Lord Captain are quite safe with me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich emite una risita triste.{/n} «Mi trabajo es tomar los caminos donde acecha la muerte, pero esta vez es distinto. El tren es la forma más rápida y segura de salir de aquí. No se preocupe, maestra Tlass. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán y usted están a salvo conmigo».

languages.text: {n}アインリッヒは悲しげな笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「死が彷徨いかねない道を行くのが私の仕事です。でも、今回は違う。列車が一番安全で、早くここから脱出できます。ご心配なく、トラス氏。あなたとロード・キャプテンは、私と一緒にいれば安全です」
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich gives a sad little chuckle.{/n} "It is my job to take the paths where death may be prowling. But not this time. The train is the safest and fastest way out of here. Worry not, Mistress Tlass. You and the Lord Captain are quite safe with me."

traits.locale_text: {n}アインリッヒは悲しげな笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「死が彷徨いかねない道を行くのが私の仕事です。でも、今回は違う。列車が一番安全で、早くここから脱出できます。ご心配なく、トラス氏。あなたとロード・キャプテンは、私と一緒にいれば安全です」

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇悲伤地轻笑起来。{/n}“我的职责就是游荡在死亡徘徊之地，但这次绝对不会有问题。如果要离开这里的话，乘坐列车是最快、最安全的手段。不用担心，特拉斯女士，我一定会保障你和舰长大人的安全。”
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich gives a sad little chuckle.{/n} "It is my job to take the paths where death may be prowling. But not this time. The train is the safest and fastest way out of here. Worry not, Mistress Tlass. You and the Lord Captain are quite safe with me."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇悲伤地轻笑起来。{/n}“我的职责就是游荡在死亡徘徊之地，但这次绝对不会有问题。如果要离开这里的话，乘坐列车是最快、最安全的手段。不用担心，特拉斯女士，我一定会保障你和舰长大人的安全。”

languages.text: {n}Einrich lacht traurig auf.{/n} "Es ist meine Aufgabe, die Pfade zu nehmen, auf denen der Tod vielleicht pirscht. Doch diesmal nicht. Der Zug ist der schnellste und sicherste Weg hier heraus. Seid unbesorgt, Herrin Tlass. Ihr und der Lord Captain seid bei mir vollkommen sicher."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich gives a sad little chuckle.{/n} "It is my job to take the paths where death may be prowling. But not this time. The train is the safest and fastest way out of here. Worry not, Mistress Tlass. You and the Lord Captain are quite safe with me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich lacht traurig auf.{/n} "Es ist meine Aufgabe, die Pfade zu nehmen, auf denen der Tod vielleicht pirscht. Doch diesmal nicht. Der Zug ist der schnellste und sicherste Weg hier heraus. Seid unbesorgt, Herrin Tlass. Ihr und der Lord Captain seid bei mir vollkommen sicher."

languages.text: {n}Einrich se permet un petit rire triste.{/n} « L'essence même de mon travail consiste à me rendre là où guette la mort. Mais pas cette fois. Le train est le moyen le plus sûr et le plus rapide de quitter cet endroit. Ne vous inquiétez pas, maîtresse Tlass. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} et vous serez parfaitement en sécurité avec moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich gives a sad little chuckle.{/n} "It is my job to take the paths where death may be prowling. But not this time. The train is the safest and fastest way out of here. Worry not, Mistress Tlass. You and the Lord Captain are quite safe with me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich se permet un petit rire triste.{/n} « L'essence même de mon travail consiste à me rendre là où guette la mort. Mais pas cette fois. Le train est le moyen le plus sûr et le plus rapide de quitter cet endroit. Ne vous inquiétez pas, maîtresse Tlass. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} et vous serez parfaitement en sécurité avec moi. »

languages.text: {n}Einrich kasvetle gülüyor.{/n} "Ölümün gezindiği yerlere giden yolları yürümek benim işimdir. Fakat bu defa yürümeyeceğim. Tren, buradan çıkmanın en güvenli ve hızlı yolu. Endişe etmeyin Üstat Tlass. Siz ve Lord Kaptan, yanımda gayet güvendesiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich gives a sad little chuckle.{/n} "It is my job to take the paths where death may be prowling. But not this time. The train is the safest and fastest way out of here. Worry not, Mistress Tlass. You and the Lord Captain are quite safe with me."
